The Burmese: language title of the post translates to English as "Chance to get MMK 1500,000 (US$ 1137) for every household in Myanmar."
Part of the post states that Pyay Ti Oo: 000,000 (US$ 380,000) to every household in Myanmar through the Facebook group, with instructions on how to withdraw the funds.
The spokesperson of Pyay Ti Oo Education: U Nyi Nyi, confirmed that the claim is "not true" and that the foundation is solely focused on supporting education.
